plot: In the face of gridlock and global warming, a bike ride home can make images and sounds come together serendipitously to form a perfect moment.
title: Commute
plot_es: In the face of gridlock and global warming, a bike ride home can make images and sounds come together serendipitously to form a perfect moment.
plot_en: In the face of gridlock and global warming, a bike ride home can make images and sounds come together serendipitously to form a perfect moment.
